message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $102.50. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $98 for the product. That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $105, Bob. I think that's a fair price for this product. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at $105.
I'm not willing to pay $105, Alice. I was thinking more along the lines of $97.50. That's my last offer.

I've made concessions, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $105. I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to meet you at $102, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $102. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $97.50 and $102, which is $99.50. That's my final offer.
